mapper.sql:
select t.id id , t.deptid deptid , t.mchcode mchCode, m.mchname mchcodename, d.name deptname, t.materialcode materialcode , b.`name` materialname, sum(t.total_s) totalS , t.unit unit , sum(t.total_s*b.covert_ratio) CTotal, b.convert_flag as cunit, sum(t.total_m) totalM , sum(t.total_t) totalT , t.modifytime modifytime
FROM t
mapper.select:
INNER join b_material_info b
on t.materialCode=b.code
LEFT JOIN admin_dept d ON t.deptId=d.dept_id INNER JOIN mch_cus_view m ON (m.mchCode=t.mchCode AND m.deptid=t.deptid)
GROUP BY t.deptId,t.materialCode
order by ${orderStr}

select count(1) from (select t.* from c_stock_info t
GROUP BY t.deptId,t.materialCode ) t

select mchcode mchcode , id id , deptid deptid , materialcode materialcode , total_s totalS , unit unit , total_m totalM , total_t totalT , modifytime modifytime , ishave ishave FROM t WHERE mchcode = #{mchcode} and deptid = #{deptid}
